data.title: RAI FILM
data.text:
The RAI supplies a service based on the distribution and sale of ethnographic films on DVD and online for educational and academic purposes. New titles are added on a rolling basis.

All films are available on DVD, and a selection is also available in a digital format through Kanopy and ProQuest/Alexander Street Press.

To browse the catalogue, use the explorer tool on the right: use buttons to add and remove filters or use the open search box.

To purchase a DVD, please email film@therai.org.uk. To purchase a single title stream, click on the BUY DIGITAL VERSION button on the specific film page.
